original_text: But please do not refuse to help us. Show that you are a faithful God. Jerusalem is the place where you have your beautiful throne. So do not go away and leave us. Remember the covenant that you made with us. Please do what you promised to do for us. But please do not refuse to help us. Show that you are a faithful God. Jerusalem is the place where you have your beautiful throne. So do not go away and leave us. Remember the covenant that you made with us. Please do what you promised to do for us. But please do not refuse to help us.
korean_text: 주의 이름을 위하여 우리를 미워하지 마옵소서 주의 영광의 보좌를 욕되게 마옵소서 주께서 우리와 세우신 언약을 기억하시고 폐하지 마옵소서

sentences.original_text: But please do not refuse to help us.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 제발 우리를 도와주기를 거절하지 마십시오.

sentences.original_text: Show that you are a faithful God.
where you have your beautiful throne.
So do not go away and leave us.
Please do what you promised to do for us.
sentences.korean_translation: 제발 당신이 우리에게 하겠다고 약속한 것을 행하십시오.

sentences.original_text: But please do not refuse to help us.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 제발 우리를 도와주기를 거절하지 마십시오.

where you have your beautiful throne.
